metadata.source: Ford Risk Score Engine - Argonne Integration

cohorts.prior_source: Argonne DOE 2015 Study – 5yr SOC Failure Rate for Midwest Light Trucks

temp_delta_high.source: Prasad et al. 2023; BU-804 Heat Stress Correlation Studies

short_trip_behavior.definition: Average trip duration < 15 minutes, insufficient recharge time
short_trip_behavior.source: BU-403 Duty Cycle Analysis; Argonne Fleet Study 2015

ignition_cycles_high.definition: ≥ 40 ignition-on events in last 30 days, excessive cycling stress
ignition_cycles_high.source: BU-806a Deep Discharge Studies; Peukert Law Applications

cold_extreme.definition: Average ambient temperature < 20°F, cold cranking stress
cold_extreme.source: Peukert Law Cold Start Studies; SAE J537 Standards

ign_off_to_on_under_1hr.definition: Rest period < 1hr between trips for >15% of start events
ign_off_to_on_under_1hr.source: Battery University sulfation studies; Ford Internal 2020-2022

cohorts.prior_source: Argonne DOE 2015 – Hot Region Baseline Commercial Fleet Analysis

temp_extreme_hot.source: BU-804 Heat-Induced Battery Fade; Phoenix Test Data 2019-2021

ignition_cycles_high.definition: High idle time + frequent starts for commercial duty cycle
ignition_cycles_high.source: BU-806a Fleet Duty-Cycle Stress Analysis; Ford Commercial Data

trip_duration_low.definition: Average trip duration < 12 minutes, urban delivery pattern
trip_duration_low.source: Argonne Commercial Testbed 2015; UPS Fleet Study

temp_delta_high.definition: Day/night temperature swing ≥ 25°F, thermal cycling stress
temp_delta_high.source: NREL Thermal Stress Cycling Studies; Desert Environment Analysis

cohorts.prior_source: Argonne DOE 2015 – Northeast Passenger Car Baseline

salt_corrosion.definition: High road salt exposure, terminal corrosion acceleration
salt_corrosion.source: SAE J2334 Corrosion Studies; Northeast Winter Analysis

urban_stop_start.definition: Stop-start traffic pattern >60% of drive time
urban_stop_start.source: Urban Driving Cycle Analysis; NYC Fleet Data 2020-2022

temp_cycling_moderate.source: BU-804 Moderate Climate Studies; NHTSA Regional Data

cohorts.prior_source: Ford Fleet Services 2020-2022 – Commercial SUV Failure Analysis

high_mileage_annual.definition: Annual mileage >25,000 miles, accelerated wear pattern
high_mileage_annual.source: Ford Fleet Analytics 2020-2022; Commercial Usage Studies

multi_driver_usage.source: Fleet Management Studies; Driver Behavior Analysis 2021

extended_idle.definition: Extended idle time >30% of engine hours
extended_idle.source: Police Fleet Studies; Emergency Service Vehicle Analysis

maintenance_deferred.source: Ford Service Analytics 2020-2022; Fleet Maintenance Tracking
